enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for sophomore, junior, and seniors in the Acting track.
Add Consent: Instructor Consent Required
title: SoC THEATRE 349-2-22 Acting III: Problems in Style

instructors.instructor_addr: Theatre and Interpretation Center 1949 Campus Drive, Evanston

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is designed to prepare the student actor for participation in Northwestern University's acting showcase in New York City during spring break. The course will primarily consist of research, development, rehearsal and direction of scene work to be used in the showcase. Students will learn how to create a professional resume, and will be required to acquire professional caliber head shots. The class will be complimented by guest lectures and direction, from casting professionals and directors from Chicago. The class will culminate in a dress rehearsal before an audience prior to leaving to perform the showcase in New York City.

subject: THEATRE
